directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a large bowl, combine sugar, salt, eggs, vinegar and melted butter. Beat well. Fold in pecans, raisins and coconut.
Pour into unbaked pie shell. Bake on lower rack in oven at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 30 minutes. Top should brown lightly.
title: Gardenia Pie
